document.full_text: a morgan stanley property fund failed to make $3.3 billion in debt payments by a deadline on friday, handing over the keys to a central tokyo office building to blackstone  and other investors, the largest repayment failure of its kind in japan.
document.title: morgan stanley fund fails to repay debt on tokyo property
lines_and_colors: a morgan stanley property fund failed to make $3.3 billion in debt payments by a deadline on friday, handing over the keys to a central tokyo office building to blackstone  and other investors, the largest repayment failure of its kind in japan.
